item.description:
Come join us at The Forum in the Back Bay; meet your existing friends and acquaintences and make new ones.

Chef Jared Chiamciola will be preparing some appetizers (courtesy of Sitz). The Chef's speciality is "progressive, creative American cuisine. Come early for the best selections...quantities are limited!

Parking on the street might be a challenge (bless your parking angel). One can park at the Prudential Center Garage and although the Forum does not validate, if one buys something at the Prudential Shops, there parking can be validated. There is also valet parking for $16.00

The T sevices the area via the Green Line (Copley Square or Prudential), or the Orange Line (Back Bay Station)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the active, smiling group of people on the 1st floor near the back of the bar
item.name: An Afterwork in the Back Bay
